<ce:section-title>Supplementary material</ce:section-title><ce:para id="para0050" view="all">
<ce:display>
<ce:e-component id="e-component0005">
<ce:label>Crystal Strucuters</ce:label>
<ce:caption>
<ce:simple-para id="simple-para0040" view="all">Crystallographic data.</ce:simple-para>
</ce:caption>
<ce:link locator="mmc1"></ce:link>
</ce:e-component>
</ce:display>
</ce:para><ce:simple-para id="simple-para0045" view="all">The synthesis of complexes is as follows: A mixture of AgNO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (0.168<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), Ln(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>
<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>·<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O [0.446<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>; 0.456<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol for <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>; 0.458<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol for <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>], oxalic acid (0.900<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), nic (0.123<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g, 1<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), and H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>ml) was stirred for 30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>min in air and then sealed in a 23<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon reactor and kept under autogenous pressure at 150<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 4<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>days. The mixture was cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>, and yellow blocky crystals were obtained in a yield of 50% based on Eu for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> [45% based on Dy for <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>; 42% based on Ho for <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>]. <ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: C<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>AgEuN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf> (628.09): calcd. C, 26.77, H, 1.92, N, 4.46; found C, 26.70, H, 1.95, N, 4.41. IR (KBr): 3417, 1608(vs), 1562(vs), 1406(m), 1325(m), 1118(w), 796(m), 759(w), 702<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>. <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>: C<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>AgDyN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf> (638.63): calcd. C, 26.33, H, 1.89, N, 4.39; found C, 26.30, H, 1.95, N, 4.35. IR (KBr): 3437, 1608(vs), 1568(vs), 1404 (m), 1321(m), 1122(w), 1055(m), 869(w), 796(m), 756(w), 700, 553, 507, 418<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>. <ce:bold>3</ce:bold>: C<ce:inf loc="post">14</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">12</ce:inf>AgHoN<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf> (641.06): calcd. C, 26.23, H, 1.89, N, 4.37; found C, 26.17, H, 1.95, N, 4.35. IR (KBr): 3309, 1612(vs), 1560(vs), 1411(m), 1201, 1097(w), 840(m), 756(w), 692(m), 623(w), 534, 420<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>.</ce:simple-para>
clean_text:
Supplementary material

   Crystal Strucuters  Crystallographic data.     

The synthesis of complexes is as follows: A mixture of AgNO3 (0.168g, 1mmol), Ln(NO3)3 ⋅6H2O [0.446g, 1mmol for 1; 0.456g, 1mmol for 2; 0.458g, 1mmol for 3], oxalic acid (0.900g, 1mmol), nic (0.123g, 1mmol), and H2O (10ml) was stirred for 30min in air and then sealed in a 23mL Teflon reactor and kept under autogenous pressure at 150°C for 4days. The mixture was cooled to room temperature at a rate of 10°Ch-1, and yellow blocky crystals were obtained in a yield of 50% based on Eu for 1 [45% based on Dy for 2; 42% based on Ho for 3]. 1: C14H12AgEuN2O10 (628.09): calcd. C, 26.77, H, 1.92, N, 4.46; found C, 26.70, H, 1.95, N, 4.41. IR (KBr): 3417, 1608(vs), 1562(vs), 1406(m), 1325(m), 1118(w), 796(m), 759(w), 702cm-1. 2: C14H12AgDyN2O10 (638.63): calcd. C, 26.33, H, 1.89, N, 4.39; found C, 26.30, H, 1.95, N, 4.35. IR (KBr): 3437, 1608(vs), 1568(vs), 1404 (m), 1321(m), 1122(w), 1055(m), 869(w), 796(m), 756(w), 700, 553, 507, 418cm-1. 3: C14H12AgHoN2O10 (641.06): calcd. C, 26.23, H, 1.89, N, 4.37; found C, 26.17, H, 1.95, N, 4.35. IR (KBr): 3309, 1612(vs), 1560(vs), 1411(m), 1201, 1097(w), 840(m), 756(w), 692(m), 623(w), 534, 420cm-1.
